text: Lars Anders Fredrik "Lasse" Mårtenson (24 September 1934 - 14 May 2016) was a Finnish singer, composer, actor and theater conductor. He was born in Helsinki. He performed at the Eurovision Song Contest in 1964 with the song "Laiskotellen" ("Idling").Suomen MM-kisat 2003 (World Championships in Finland 2003. In Finnish). Suomen Jäähallimusiikit Mårtenson died of a cerebral haemorrhage, aged 81.Lasse Mårtenson har avlidit ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from cerebral hemorrhage Category:Finnish singers Category:Finnish composers Category:Conductors Category:Actors from Helsinki
title: Lasse Mårtenson
